categories.name: RPG系统
categories.description: 角色扮演游戏相关的插件，包括玩家数据、技能、职业等
categories.description_en: Role-playing game related plugins including player data, skills, classes, etc.

categories.name: 经济系统
categories.description: 货币、商店、交易相关的插件
categories.description_en: Currency, shop, and trading related plugins

categories.name: 管理工具
categories.description: 服务器管理和维护工具

categories.name: 社交功能
categories.description: 聊天、好友、公会等社交功能
categories.description_en: Chat, friends, guilds and other social features

categories.name: 小游戏
categories.description: 各种小游戏和娱乐功能

categories.name: 世界管理
categories.description: 世界生成、保护、传送等功能

categories.name: API扩展
categories.description: 为其他插件提供API的扩展插件
categories.description_en: Extension plugins that provide APIs for other plugins

categories.name: 保护系统
categories.description: 领地保护、反作弊等安全功能
categories.description_en: Land protection, anti-cheat and security features

categories.name: 装饰功能
categories.description: 粒子效果、称号、皮肤等装饰功能
categories.description_en: Particle effects, titles, skins and other cosmetic features
